column4: does anyone know if the Athlon series offer SSE2 or MMX support? or was that only the Intel and older 586 AMD?
i have an athlon xp, it has mmx but not sse
thanks I was trying to compile something on an Athlon XP 1700 processor and wasn't sure what instruction set it supported
apparently im wrong. i'm not on the machine right now to check :p
